alert.note: Alert for Duval; Inland Kleberg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 8:51PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Duval, southwestern Jim Wells and west central Kleberg Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 851 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Premont, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Duval, southwestern Jim Wells and west central Kleberg Counties. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 688 and 708. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
